attributes.action: to call on Post Office Ltd not to close the Groomsport Village, Co. Down Post Office. More details
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Groomsport Post Office serves a community of 3,000 people, and deserves to be kept open. Children, Pensioners and all local people want the Groomsport Post Office to remain open!
